articles.title: Biden shrugs off worst jobs report of his presidency; critics say he botched the economy
articles.description: President Biden on Friday shrugged off the worst jobs report of his presidency as the U.S. economy added less than half the number of jobs expected in December amid a massive surge in COVID-19 cases.
